overview: Anything can happen at The Love Hotel, and when Private babes are in town & you know things are going to get wild! A night of passion soon turns into three for Jayla de Angelis and her boyfriend, a couple who will soon discover just how horny Candice Demelza is too. Meanwhile, receptionists Geishakyd and Erik Everhard celebrate their close working relationship in true Private style, and debutant Sata Jones goes on a raunchy anal date with the driver. Four sexy girls. Four sexy stories. Private Blockbusters, The Love Hotel, don t miss it!
title: The Love Hotel
